title: Grand Canyon National Park: Teacher-Ranger-Teachers
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development     Teacher-Ranger-Teachers                Teacher-Ranger-Teachers       At this time, Grand Canyon National Park is not offering a Teacher-Ranger-Teacher program. Please check back later, or follow our Twitter feed for updates: @GrandCanyonEdu  Â       Grand Canyon has participated in the National Park Service's Teacher-Ranger-Teacher program. This program provides selected teachers the opportunity to spend a summer working as a Grand Canyon park ranger and gain valuable educational experience to take back to the classroom.  To learn more about the national program, visit http://www.nps.gov/learn/trt/
